extendedInfo.description: GradeWizard was runner-up for a 2011 **BEST APP EVER** award in the College Student App category: http://bestappever.com/awards/2011/winner/cledGradeWizard is a powerful, yet easy-to-use tool for tracking and predicting your academic progress. With GradeWizard you'll always know how you are doing in school.GradeWizard is much more than a simple GPA calculator. It is both a grade tracker and a grade prediction powerhouse. It can track and predict everything from your cumulative 4-year GPA all the way down to individual assignments. Unlock your academic potential with GradeWizard!Features: - Useful throughout the school year, not just when final grades are given out - Color coded grade display - Track by terms, classes, grade groups, and individual assignments - Calculates guaranteed and potential grades - Calculates cumulative and major GPA - Fully customizable grading schemes   - Configure how percentages map to letter grades and grade points   - Can easily be set up for +/- grading, weighted classes, etc.   - Configure default grading scheme and override it on a per-class basis   - Pre-packaged with many commonly used grading schemesLite version is limited to: - Tracking only 1 Term - Tracking only 3 Classes - Otherwise fully functionalIf you like the Lite version please consider purchasing the full version!App Permissions Required: - Read/Write External Storage - Used for importing and exporting your grades and settingsKeywords: grade, wizard, gpa, tracking, tracker, calculator, calculation, predict, predictor, prediction, potential, school, college, university, class, course, curriculum, syllabus, improvement, helper, organizer, organization, planner, planning, goals, final grade, exam, homework, assignment,

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This is by far the best tracker that I have seen. However, there should be a spot to where you can add extra credit because many college professors offer it. The easiest way to do this is allow a total grade of more than 100% then the users will figure it out from there. Otherwise would have definitely been a 5 star app
reviews.author: greg phillips

reviews.comment: This app is perfect for college
reviews.author: Crystal Williams

reviews.title: Absolutely love
reviews.comment: An app that has met all my needs. Was looking for something that could track individual assignments and integrate it with where my  current standing in the class was. I best feature of all was customizing my grading scheme. My school has the weirdest 9 point. System.. First time ever giving an app a perfect fit 5 stars! Thumbs up grade wizard!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Application - Simple to Use
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this application on quite a few occasions to project the grades I\'d need to get to pass a course.  The application is updated on a regular basis and many of the features I\'d initially wanted were included in subsequent versions of the app.  This App is a Must Download!
reviews.author: James Hales

reviews.title: One improvement
reviews.comment: You should add a category for bonus marks that will be calculated and properly account for the bonus marks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Razr
reviews.comment: Love this app! A must get for college students!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app for basic grade tracking. I used this last semester and had no problems with it. You can customize the grading down to plus and minus which is nice. I wish I had more use of this app since I\'m graduating this semester.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dillinger
reviews.comment: I uses this apparently daily. Grades improve if u use it. Tracks progress.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it but it force closes too often... frustrating- EVO 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: The paid version was exactly what I was looking for!  I have programmed in all of my courses and marks, and now I know that I can slack instead of stress through finals and not have to worry.  I am guaranteed to pass all of my courses. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
